description.value: This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a Potion of Healing|XDMG or another beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. Identify|XPHB reveals its true nature. If you drink this potion, you take 4d6 Poison damage and must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned|XPHB condition for 1 hour.

_srdData.name: Potion of Poison
entries: This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a {@item Potion of Healing|XDMG} or another beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. {@spell Identify|XPHB} reveals its true nature.
If you drink this potion, you take {@damage 4d6} Poison damage and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 hour.
